channel.title: D Claws to powerfull and spec is strange
channel.description:
Hello,
if i spec with my d claws it hits like 50 50 50 50 with only hit once 50 and its way to powerfull i want that it hit like random and not higher then 35 just like rs or sumthing what i have to do if u want more info ask
greetz Nighel

item.title: D Claws to powerfull and spec is strange
item.dc:creator: @lover854 lover854
item.description:
@lover854 wrote:

ya i know that but when i spec then its still power full and u see 4 spec hit but only hit once

Read full topic
item.source: D Claws to powerfull and spec is strange

item.title: D Claws to powerfull and spec is strange
item.dc:creator: @Rune.Kings Rune.Kings
item.description:
@Rune.Kings wrote:

Go to the Config files and open up item. Look for Dragon Claws and make the Strength bonus lower.

Read full topic
